Description: Any amount of damage dealt by a creature with deathtouch is enough to kill a creature it damages.
A creature with defender can't attack.
A creature with double strike deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.
Enchant identifies what an Aura spell can target and what an Aura permanent can enchant.
A creature with first strike deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.
A player can play a card with flash any time they have priority.
A creature with flying can't be blocked by creatures without flying or reach.
Creatures with haste can attack and tap as soon as they come under a player's control.
A permanent or player with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities an opponent controls.
A permanent with indestructible can't be destroyed.
Damage dealt by a source with lifelink causes that source's controller to gain that much life.
A creature with menace can't be blocked by only one creature.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Creatures with reach can block creatures with flying.
A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
A creature with vigilance doesn't tap to attack.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses life.
Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.
As this creature enters the battlefield, put more counters on it for each card that shares a type with it.
Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices permanents.
If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing.
Another player can pay up to any amount of the mana cost.
Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.
If you cast this card for its awaken cost, also put counters on a land you control and it becomes a creature.
Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band.
Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
You may cast this card for its bestow cost. If you do, it becomes an Aura and gains enchant creature.
If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with counters on it.
Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.
You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell. If you do, put it into your hand as it resolves.
When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less.
When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another related card.
This card is every creature type.
After you cast this spell, you may exile it encoded on a creature you control.
Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for mana.
Tap any number of creatures you control with total power N or more: This vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.
Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.
As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may place N +1/+1 counters on it.
When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield.
This creature enters the battlefield with N time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.
Vehicles are artifacts that can become creatures. To do so, you tap any number of creatures you control with total power N or more.
This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.
Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
